function.name: create_new_shell_session
function.description: Initialize a new shell session for executing commands in an isolated environment.

session_name.description: A custom name for the shell session. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

shell_type.description: The type of shell to use (e.g., 'bash', 'zsh', 'powershell', 'cmd'). Defaults to the system's default shell.
